definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
Diaoyu Islands, located between Taiwan and Okinawa, controlled by Japan – which calls them the Senkaku Islands – but claimed by China as part of its territory
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.chinese: 我为这件事感到真抱歉，鱼啊。

sentences.english: The only time its okay to use your fingers is when it's a fish bone.
sentences.chinese: 只有在吃鱼的时候，才可以用手去捏鱼骨头。

sentences.english: The two fish of Pisces show Christianity's split between spirit and matter.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼宫的两条鱼表明基督教的灵性与物质的分离。

sentences.english: And a piranha 's a fish, just like your present.
sentences.chinese: 食人鱼也是一种鱼，就像你的生日礼物一样。

sentences.english: Get a fish drunk in Ohio.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州，不可以把鱼灌醉。

sentences.english: My friend Tao Jun likes fish and vegetables very much.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友陶军拿非常喜欢鱼和蔬菜。

sentences.english: Grandpa: To catch fish, you need the right magic.
sentences.chinese: 要钓到鱼，你得有正确的魔法。

sentences.english: Make sure that fish or other seafood are wrapped and use as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 切记鱼或其他海鲜要包装好，并且尽快食用。

sentences.english: Why not serve a piece of each?
sentences.chinese: 何不两条鱼各上一块呢？

sentences.english: Pregnant mothers may also be concerned about eating fish because of the mercury content.
sentences.chinese: 准妈妈也对吃鱼有顾虑，担心其汞含量超标。

sentences.english: I've been sitting here for hours but the fish aren't biting.
sentences.chinese: 钓鱼人等了好久，可是没有鱼上钩。

sentences.english: Fish will die out of water.
Eating fish overall is greatly beneficial to your health, especially that of your brain.
sentences.chinese: 吃鱼有益健康，特别是对您的大脑而言更是如此。

definition: fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
